Reviews.Title: “Expect more from a 5* hotel”
Reviews.Author: m m
Reviews.Content: The pictures of the hotel on the web site are deceiving. The air condition did not work well in the hallways and elevators. The personnel did not speak English well (even at the concierge), although they tried to help. They do not allow bringing food/beverages inside the hotel (why???). Our room was not serviced for the last 2 nights (did they expect tips???). The beach and swimming pool are nice though. Overall, it is not worth for the money you spend.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is not a 5 star but charges 5 star prices”
Reviews.Author: Lucelia
Reviews.Content: We couldn't find anything that would support the claim that it is a 5 star - location is terrible (over 1h from Istanbul in a dirty beach in the middle of nowhere), the rooms and decoration are appalling, the service is really poor and most of the staff do not speak another language but Turkish. Some of the staff try to serve you with a smile so they get some points. The food is relatively good but only in the main restaurant - eating or drinking by the pools result in food poisoning. Very expensive too - a beer in the hotel is almost 4 times the price you get outside. We have paid quite a lot to stay here and it is certainly not worth that. However, if you get a cheap deal and come expecting a 3 star hotel you will be fine.

Reviews.Title: “good location for summer stay in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: sumitminocha
Reviews.Content: very far from the airport and the city but ideal for summer stay. lot of good crowd in the area during summers. awesome breakfast every morning. hotel is huge but it is quite old and well mantained. would be recommended for travelers who have been to istanbul many times and want to stay away from the city. wifi only in the lobby. no internet connection in the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Conference destination”
Reviews.Author: spyros811
Reviews.Content: i stayed there because of a conference and it was class! Food was tasty and service very helpfull. The best part of the hotel is the pool and the sauna... Loved it!

Reviews.Title: “Unleashed pleasure”
Reviews.Author: Travellerporirua
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great value for money for a 5 Star hotel with very clean and tidy king size bed with clean linens, clean toilet and bath tub facilities and excellent air-conditioning when temps were soaring between 25 and 35 C. Both breakfast and dinner (including wines) comes along with the room rates and they were both buffet and great. With 3 swimming pools in the Hotel made things superb. Very friendly and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Marin not very good”
Reviews.Author: MarcoPolo067
Reviews.Content: The hotel was OK, but: the food was average the reception staff were very unfriendly and incompetent. They even lost the passports of two people in our group! the air conditioning did not work in a lot of the rooms. Certainly not a five star hotel!

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Marin Princess
HotelInfo.Address: E5 Karayolu uzeri | Kumburgaz, Istanbul, Turkey
